name: Pine Tar goat milk soap with tea tree and peppermint
description:
Pine Tar soap has finally been added to the permanent line! Pine tar is known to help with psoriasis, eczema and dermatitis. This bar also contains essential oils of tea tree and peppermint  and neem oil, which also help with those conditions. This bar can also be used as a shampoo bar to help with dandruff and dry scalp. A must have for anyone who suffers from dry skin itch!




Ingredients; Goat milk, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, pine tar, avocado oil, organic unrefined shea butter, neem oil, tea tree and peppermint essential oils

name: Sweet Tarts goat milk soap
description:
New for the summer line, Sweet Tarts!!! Smells sweet and fruity, just like the candy!! One of my new favorites for sure!! 



Ingredients; Goat milk, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, avocado oil, organic unrefined shea butter, fragrance oil, titanium dioxide, and micas for color

name: Goat Milk Lotions
description:
Luxurious feeling lotions made with goat milk, sweet almond oil, and organic unrefined shea butter. each bottle is between 3.4 and 3.8 oz. A little goes a long way with this lotion!! Scents include Tropical Coconut, Sweet Pea, and Tea Tree and Peppermint. 

The tea tree and peppermint lotion contains essential oils. Both tea tree and peppermint are known to help with psoriasis, eczema, and dermatitis




Ingredients for Tropical coconut and Sweet Pea; distilled water, coconut oil, sweet almond oil, goat milk, organic unrefined shea butter, emulsifying wax, stearic acid, fragrance oil, and optiphen
(preservative)

Ingredients for Tea Tree and Peppermint; distilled water, coconut oil, sweet almond oil, goat milk, organic unrefined shea butter, emulsifying wax, stearic acid, essential oils of tea tree and peppermint, and optiphen (preservative)

name: Sweet Pea goat milk soap
description:
Full goat milk soap. This is such a wonderful scent. It's described as a delicate scent of sweet peas along a garden fence. Very feminine and old fashioned with a peachy undertone. It such a nice sweet floral scent. these are nice size bars weighing between 4.7 and 5.0 oz. each. 


Goat milk, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil,  organic unrefined shea butter, avocado oil, fragrance oil, titanium dioxide, oxides and micas.

name: New Improved Spiced Mahogany goat milk soap
description:
Full goat milk soap. This scent is so intoxicating. It is described as a deep, rich, woody scent with notes of Italian bergamot, apple wood, tonka bean, sensuous patchouli, cedarwood and oakmoss with added spices of cardamom, vanilla bourbon and allspice. I just love it, It's woodsy, spicy and manly!!! This bar has extra shea butter for a nice luxurious feel. Big bars weighing in at 5.3 to 5.4 oz. 


Goat milk, olive oil, coconut oil. palm oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil, organic unrefined shea butter, avocado oil, fragrance oil, titanium dioxide, and gold mica
